trans-unit.source: Apache Cordova Tools| Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Apache Cordova Tools| Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Use Visual Studio for Apache Cordova to build cross-platform mobile apps for iOS, Android, and Windows devices with HTML, CSS, & JS. Download for free.
trans-unit.target: Use Visual Studio for Apache Cordova to build cross-platform mobile apps for iOS, Android, and Windows devices with HTML, CSS, & JS. Download for free.

trans-unit.target: Apache Cordova

trans-unit.source: Build apps for iOS, Android, and Windows using web technologies.
trans-unit.target: Build apps for iOS, Android, and Windows using web technologies.

trans-unit.source: The code you know
trans-unit.target: The code you know

trans-unit.source: Build mobile apps using HTML, CSS, and JS
trans-unit.target: Build mobile apps using HTML, CSS, and JS

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: If you know how to build web apps, you’ll quickly feel at home building mobile apps for iOS, Android and Windows using Apache Cordova.
trans-unit.target: If you know how to build web apps, you’ll quickly feel at home building mobile apps for iOS, Android and Windows using Apache Cordova.

trans-unit.source: Most developers achieve nearly 100% code re-use by leveraging Cordova’s shared JavaScript API to access native device capabilities like the camera, calendar and contacts.
trans-unit.target: Most developers achieve nearly 100% code re-use by leveraging Cordova’s shared JavaScript API to access native device capabilities like the camera, calendar and contacts.

trans-unit.source: Plus, because hybrid apps make use of native webviews, you can take your favorite JavaScript framework with you – frameworks like Angular, React and Ionic
trans-unit.target: Plus, because hybrid apps make use of native webviews, you can take your favorite JavaScript framework with you – frameworks like Angular, React and Ionic

trans-unit.source: Single install
trans-unit.target: Single install

trans-unit.source: Everything you need to get started
trans-unit.target: Everything you need to get started

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: Our easy-to-use installer performs all the heavy lifting needed to have your computer up and running with the necessary SDKs, tools, libraries, and more for building cross-platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Our easy-to-use installer performs all the heavy lifting needed to have your computer up and running with the necessary SDKs, tools, libraries, and more for building cross-platform apps.

trans-unit.source: screenshot of code editing window
trans-unit.target: screenshot of code editing window

trans-unit.source: /wp-content/uploads/2016/03/create.png
trans-unit.target: /wp-content/uploads/2016/03/create.png

trans-unit.source: Create code
trans-unit.target: Create code

trans-unit.source: Code editing made quick and painless
trans-unit.target: Code editing made quick and painless

trans-unit.source: As applications become more complex, you need more than just a text editor.
trans-unit.target: As applications become more complex, you need more than just a text editor.

trans-unit.source: You need a code editor optimized for refactoring, auto-completion and code comprehension.
trans-unit.target: You need a code editor optimized for refactoring, auto-completion and code comprehension.

trans-unit.source:
Visual Studio provides all that and more, including:
  • Syntax highlighting to help you visually identify errors
trans-unit.target:
Visual Studio provides all that and more, including:
  • Syntax highlighting to help you visually identify errors

trans-unit.source: • IntelliSense to help you better understand and code against new APIs
trans-unit.target: • IntelliSense to help you better understand and code against new APIs

trans-unit.source: • Code peek for in-line reference review
trans-unit.target: • Code peek for in-line reference review

trans-unit.source: Learn more about editing in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Learn more about editing in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Preview and test
trans-unit.target: Preview and test

trans-unit.source: Ensure your app looks and works exactly as you intended
trans-unit.target: Ensure your app looks and works exactly as you intended

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: Whether you’re targeting iOS, Android or Windows, Visual Studio provides preview support for a wide variety of emulators and tethered devices.
trans-unit.target: Whether you’re targeting iOS, Android or Windows, Visual Studio provides preview support for a wide variety of emulators and tethered devices.

trans-unit.source: You can even deploy and debug emulators hosted on a remote or virtual machine (e.g. Parallels).
trans-unit.target: You can even deploy and debug emulators hosted on a remote or virtual machine (e.g. Parallels).

trans-unit.source: For developers working in an exclusively Windows-based work environment, Visual Studio offers the ability to build for Mac OS remotely via services like MacInCloud.
trans-unit.target: For developers working in an exclusively Windows-based work environment, Visual Studio offers the ability to build for Mac OS remotely via services like MacInCloud.

trans-unit.source: screenshot of debugging window
trans-unit.target: screenshot of debugging window

trans-unit.source: /wp-content/uploads/2016/03/debugging.png
trans-unit.target: /wp-content/uploads/2016/03/debugging.png

trans-unit.source: Debug and analyze
trans-unit.target: Debug and analyze

trans-unit.source: More time coding, less time finding bugs
trans-unit.target: More time coding, less time finding bugs

trans-unit.source: Anywhere your code runs, Visual Studio can debug it – whether your code is running on an iOS, Android or Windows device, an emulator or simulator, or a browser-based debug target like Ripple.
trans-unit.target: Anywhere your code runs, Visual Studio can debug it – whether your code is running on an iOS, Android or Windows device, an emulator or simulator, or a browser-based debug target like Ripple.

trans-unit.source: There's no need to switch tools when you build for a different platform.
trans-unit.target: There's no need to switch tools when you build for a different platform.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio connects to almost any deploy target.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio connects to almost any deploy target.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio’s debugger lets you step through code with breakpoints and automatic exception notifications that expose the run-time state of objects and variables.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio’s debugger lets you step through code with breakpoints and automatic exception notifications that expose the run-time state of objects and variables.

trans-unit.source: Advanced features like edit-and-continue, conditional breakpoints, tracepoints and hit counts provide the kind of deep analysis you need to make coding enjoyable and not a merciless game of “find the bug.” Learn more about debugging in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Advanced features like edit-and-continue, conditional breakpoints, tracepoints and hit counts provide the kind of deep analysis you need to make coding enjoyable and not a merciless game of “find the bug.” Learn more about debugging in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Web apps evolved
trans-unit.target: Web apps evolved

trans-unit.source: Access native device capabilities
trans-unit.target: Access native device capabilities

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: Powered by Apache Cordova, your apps written in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript can easily access native device APIs not yet available to browsers (e.g.
trans-unit.target: Powered by Apache Cordova, your apps written in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript can easily access native device APIs not yet available to browsers (e.g.

trans-unit.source: camera, calendar, contacts, barcode scanner, and more!).
trans-unit.target: camera, calendar, contacts, barcode scanner, and more!).

trans-unit.source: Best of all, you can access native device capabilities through a common JavaScript API so you get maximum code re-use throughout your application.
trans-unit.target: Best of all, you can access native device capabilities through a common JavaScript API so you get maximum code re-use throughout your application.

trans-unit.source: Connected to data
trans-unit.target: Connected to data

trans-unit.source: Deliver a more personalized app experience
trans-unit.target: Deliver a more personalized app experience

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio and Azure provide the tools and services necessary to deliver a personalized experience across all your devices – phones, tablets, desktops, TVs and “things” running iOS, Android and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio and Azure provide the tools and services necessary to deliver a personalized experience across all your devices – phones, tablets, desktops, TVs and “things” running iOS, Android and Windows.

trans-unit.source:
With just a few lines of code, you can:
  • Use push notifications to connect with specific users or entire audiences
trans-unit.target:
With just a few lines of code, you can:
  • Use push notifications to connect with specific users or entire audiences

trans-unit.source: • Enable real-time messaging to spark conversation and sharing among your users
trans-unit.target: • Enable real-time messaging to spark conversation and sharing among your users

trans-unit.source: • Support offline capabilities for those times when a network connection isn’t available
trans-unit.target: • Support offline capabilities for those times when a network connection isn’t available

trans-unit.source: • Manage Exchange data using Office 365 Service APIs to share and edit calendars, contacts, files and more
trans-unit.target: • Manage Exchange data using Office 365 Service APIs to share and edit calendars, contacts, files and more

trans-unit.source: Most importantly, you have the backing of Azure to scale to millions of devices on-demand.
trans-unit.target: Most importantly, you have the backing of Azure to scale to millions of devices on-demand.

trans-unit.source: Committed to open source
trans-unit.target: Committed to open source

trans-unit.source: Helping you navigate open source tools, frameworks, and platforms
trans-unit.target: Helping you navigate open source tools, frameworks, and platforms

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: Did you know that we are committers to Apache Cordova?
trans-unit.target: Did you know that we are committers to Apache Cordova?

trans-unit.source: That we develop and maintain dozens of cross-platform plugins?
trans-unit.target: That we develop and maintain dozens of cross-platform plugins?

trans-unit.source: That we're collaborating with Google to deliver Angular JS 2.0?
trans-unit.target: That we're collaborating with Google to deliver Angular JS 2.0?

trans-unit.source: This is good news for you.
trans-unit.target: This is good news for you.

trans-unit.source: If you run into any issues while building your Apache Cordova app, we have the technical depth and breadth to help you navigate the complexity of open source software.
trans-unit.target: If you run into any issues while building your Apache Cordova app, we have the technical depth and breadth to help you navigate the complexity of open source software.

trans-unit.source: We can share workarounds, provide bug fixes, and lend insight into the roadmap of many open-source projects used for cross-platform and mobile web applications.
trans-unit.target: We can share workarounds, provide bug fixes, and lend insight into the roadmap of many open-source projects used for cross-platform and mobile web applications.

trans-unit.source: You can find the product team on StackOverflow, MSDN Forums or Twitter.
trans-unit.target: You can find the product team on StackOverflow, MSDN Forums or Twitter.
